description:
Frustrated that it takes so long to plan, curate, share and track your social media efforts? Not sure you can afford a dedicated social media manager? Don't have more than a few hours a week to deal with it?

This course offers no fluff, just straight-forward walk-throughs and explanations of how I manage social media for a variety of clients. (This is the SAME course that I teach one-on-one to clients all over the U.S.)

This course is recommended for:

  • Small business owners who want to handle their own social or can't afford a dedicated social media manager
  • Social media managers looking for an effective new way to curate, schedule, share, track, and report
  • Bloggers and web professionals who need a no-nonsense system to build traffic without gimmicks or a large budget
  • Anyone who has trouble with consistently sharing to social

We take most popular platforms (Facebook and Twitter) along with the easy tools contained in the Shareist scheduling platform to help you set up a system that takes less than 2 hours a week to maintain -- regardless of how many times you want to share! Watch your traffic increase with minimal effort...

This course requires a subscription to the Shareist social media sharing platform. A free trial is available, and prices start at $25 a month after that for the basic plan. You must also have a personal Facebook account, access to a Facebook page as an admin, and a Twitter account.

You will receive step-by-step video walk-throughs of how to set up your Shareist account, connect social media profiles, find and share content, and optimize your shares to create a strong engagement and continued social media growth. Sample planning calendars and checklists will also be included to set up your week for social media success.

Once your system is set up, you can expect to spend less than 2 hours a week to keep your social media presence strong and relevant to your clients, customers, and fans. Know exactly which updates are sending you traffic, and optimize your content sharing calendar to increase your traffic month after month -- the organic way!

This course is 100% walk-throughs and demos. Be prepared to start creating your social media calendar from day one! I offer no chatting, just action!
title: Maximize Traffic from Twitter & Facebook in 2 Hours a Week
